title.native: Show Me The Picture: The Story of Jim Marshall

production.country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

director.name: Alfred George Bailey
director.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: Photographer Jim Marshall captures the heights of the Rock and Roll music era, from the Beatles and Jimi Hendrix, to the civil rights movements and some of the most iconic moments of the 60's.
